review_blob: This is probably one of the worst beers i have ever had. It was very harsh, with a medicine and some other bullshit taste. Completely unbearable, i would rather sip on some COLT45.

This is one of my fav beers. It has a sweet and sour taste, hints of orange. Has a great white color and head. Brewed by a company that really know what they are doing, and is distributed very well. In NY you can get it at several bars, and stores. A+ beer
